(a) explain what is meant by resonance.(2) (b) the apparatus shown can be used to study resonance.fixed supportbridge supporthanging massessignal generator00000oscillation generatorlstringpulley  when the signal generator is switched on the string oscillates.  the signal generator can be adjusted so that the string resonates.  when the string resonates at its fundamental frequency f,f = 12mgl  where m is the mass of the hanging masses, l is the length of the string between the oscillation generator and the bridge support and  is a constant.
